TransactionUsageEntitlement.name: TransactionUsageEntitlement
TransactionUsageEntitlement.description: Represents the details of each usage entitlement that's granted with the purchased sellable product, such as quantity and date when the entitlements were granted.

AccountId.description: The account that's associated with the usage entitlement.

ActionType.description: The type of action that resulted in the transaction usage entitlement.

AssetId.description: The asset associated with the sellable product.

ChargeForOverage.description: The action to be taken when the entitlements are used beyond their grant values.

DrawdownOrder.description: The order that's used to debit entitlement consumption from the usage entitlement bucket.

EffectiveEndDateTime.description: The date and time when the active transaction usage entitlement ends.

EffectiveStartDateTime.description: The date and time when the transaction usage entitlement becomes active.

EntitlementQuantity.description: The entitlement quantity for the usage resource.

EntitlementProcessingStatus.description: Indicates whether the transaction usage entitlement has been processed by entitlement service to be used in Billing. Available in API version 65.0 and later.

EntitlementUomClassId.description: The unit of measure class for the usage entitlement.

EntitlementUomId.description: The unit of measure to calculate the usage entitlement.

ExternalOrderItem.description: The custom or external order item that's associated with the entitlement.

GrantBindingTargetId.description: The target associated with the entitlements that are granted with the sellable product.

GrantType.description: Specifies the type of model that defines how the usage resource is consumed. Available in API version 65.0 and later.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when this record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

Name.description: Autogenerated identifier for the transaction usage entitlement record.

NetQuantity.description: The total quantity that combines the amended quantity with the initial transaction quantity in the order item.

OrderItemId.description: The order item that's associated with the entitlement.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the owner of the transaction usage entitlement.

PricebookEntryId.description: The price book entry that's associated with the sellable product.

ProductId.description: The sellable product for which the entitlement is granted.

RatingFrequencyPolicyId.description: The sellable product for which the entitlement is granted. Available in API version 64.0 and later. This field is deprecated and will be retired in a future version.

TokenResourceId.description: The usage resource of category Token associated with the usage resource related to the usage product added in the quote line item. Available in API version 65.0 and later.

TransactionQuantity.description: The transaction quantity in the order for the usage entitlement.

UsageAggregationPolicyId.description: The usage aggregation policy for this entitlement. This field is deprecated and will be retired in a future version.

UsageGrantRefreshPolicyId.description: The usage grant refresh policy that's associated with the transaction usage entitlement.

UsageGrantRolloverPolicyId.description: The usage grant rollover policy that's associated with the transaction usage entitlement.

UsageModelType.description: The type of usage model for a product or service. Anchor is the main subscription product or service. Pack is the add-on product or service that grants additional usage resources for consumption. Commit is the product or service with a specific committed quantity of consumption.

UsageResourceId.description: The usage resource record that's associated with the transaction usage entitlement.

ValidityPeriodTerm.description: The duration for which the usage resource grant is valid, when used with the validity period units.

ValidityPeriodUnit.description: The length of a validity period for the usage resource grant, when used with the validity period term.

TransactionUsageEntitlement.accessRules: To create, update, and delete transaction usage entitlement records, you must have the Usage Management Run Time permission set license.
